item.title: Trump calls for Congress to enact 10% credit card interest rate cap; bank stocks rise
item.description: Trump's call for legislation follows a post calling on banks to limit card interest rates to 10%.

item.title: Berkshire prepares to exit 28% stake in Kraft Heinz as new CEO aims to move on from rare Buffett gaffe
item.description: The move underscores Greg Abel's willingness to look past a deal that has long stood out as a rare blemish in Buffett's otherwise storied record.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says U.S. should impose Trump's credit card rate cap in Vermont and Massachusetts
item.description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Wednesday advocated for a test of President Donald Trump's proposed credit card rate cap in Vermont and Massachusett...

item.title: Jerome Powell could stay at the Fed even after being removed as chair. Here's what that means
item.description: The saga over President Donald Trump's efforts to reshape the Federal Reserve has another twist.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Netflix, United Airlines, Kraft Heinz & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
